data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marchenko, Irina I. (2018): A new species of Halozercon (Acari: Zerconidae) from South Siberia (Russia) with additional information on Halozercon karacholana Wiśniewski et al., 1992. Zootaxa 4394 (3): 347-370, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4394.3.2
